EmailTemplate.name: Pre-onboarding Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Peritus: Pre-onboarding completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_First_Name__c} {!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_Last_Name__c},
Thank you for completing the pre-onboarding formalities. Our HR Executive will get in touch with you for any clarifications or action needed from your end.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
